metadata.title: CVE-2024-8650 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 15.0prior to 17.4.6, 17.5 prior to 17.5.4, and 17.6 prior to 17.6.2 thatallowed non-member users to view unresolved threads marked as internalnotes in public projects merge requests.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
